title: 领地怎么禁止pvp
author: roof_789
txt_content:
我输入/res set roof pvp t 为什么还是能pvp
还有我为什么只能弄一个领地

replies.author: 脑残羊
replies.txt_content:
您好
您应该站在领地内输入/res set pvp f
在配置文件里的MaxResidences
可以更改领地的最大数量
求精

replies.author: MrSnakerrrr
replies.txt_content: /res set roof pvp f  即可，t是true就是可以PVP，f则是不可

replies.author: 1grt1
replies.txt_content: 你应该输入/res set roof pvp false

replies.author: Cynthia丶
replies.txt_content: resadmin set 领地 pvp f

replies.author: roof_789
replies.txt_content:
1grt1 发表于 2015-11-8 09:30
你应该输入/res set roof pvp false
我试过了不行..

replies.author: roof_789
replies.txt_content:
Cynthia丶 发表于 2015-11-8 10:32
resadmin set 领地 pvp f
我试过不行啊

roof_789 发表于 2015-11-8 13:01
我试过不行啊
/res set 这里改成你的领地名 pvp f

replies.author: aaaa919716186
replies.txt_content:
领地PVP关闭是/res set 领地名字 pvp f
领地数量在服务器插件里配置

replies.author: roof_789
replies.txt_content:
aaaa919716186 发表于 2015-11-8 14:23
领地PVP关闭是/res set 领地名字 pvp f
领地数量在服务器插件里配置
我输入/res set roof pvp f 还是不行啊

replies.author: Jayshon-Yves
replies.txt_content: 站在你自己的领地里面输入/res set pvp f
